description:
Mayors LED program ???
What happened to the mayor's LED program. The city had a wonderful LED conversion program going. WHY HAS IT STOPED !!!!!
The City of Boston WAS receiving large Energy savings checks from Eversource, in the hundreds of thousands of dollars. 
WHY HAVE THEY STOPED !!!!!
There are so many streets that have not been completed. There are so many streets with temporary wires going to the old big black box lights, that have not been turned into LEDs. WHY HAVE THEY STOPED !!!

You made a promise to convert all the old lights into LED.
Who made the call to stop this program! The city of Boston residents deserve to save money in energy costs. 
Please start this program back up, finish what you started. Make our city beautiful.

The email below was sent to BPS Transportation after a supervisor refused to speak to me today.
I have come to expect no more than being ignored, passed off & patronized
from BPS and it's sub-departments.  
I am disabled, my daughter is developmentally delayed and I am sick & tired of the same old routine with BPS Transportation.  I am all done with niceties.  
Please respond with someone, anyone who a) can tell me what's gonna be done about these issues without any bs whatsoever and, b) help me understand how I can help BPS be a more parent-friendly place.
Please.

Start email:

Hello,

I’m writing to express concern regarding my child’s morning bus driver.  My daughter is assigned to bus XXXXX, door to door service from our home to the XXXXXX School in Dorchester.  On both September 6 & 7 the bus was at least an hour & a half late, but that is not my main concern.  On September 6th, I witnessed the bus driver driving about 2 MPH in my neighborhood.  The driver would drive 5 ft, stop, drive 5 more feet, stop again, and so forth.  I suspect they weren’t even stepping on the gas peddle.  It seemed as though they had never driven a vehicle in their life, never mind a school bus full of kids.  I spoke with the bus monitor and her explanation for the late arrival time was that the driver did not do a dry run of the route.  When I asked about why the driver was driving as though it was their very first day behind the wheel of ANY vehicle, the monitor shrugged.  The conversation between myself and the monitor was cut short because the driver pulled away when I asked why the driver wasn’t able to take a simple left hand turn and was only driving 2 MPH at a stop & go pace.  

I’m told that the buses have devices on board that record the buses’ motions.  I would like to know what the recordings  on my daughter’s bus revealed and what is being done about it.  

I would like a response to my concerns ASAP.  I cannot put my child on a bus with a driver who, very obviously, cannot drive.  Furthermore, the driver should not be driving a school bus until they are fully trained and confident that they can safely operate a bus full of children.  

I look forward to hearing from someone as soon as possible.

Thank you,
April Terrio

Sent from my iPhone.
